item.description:
Report X-2024121095

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-13
  • City: PORT HURON
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS INSPECTION TO FIND TWELVE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF SHERWIN WILLIAMS READY MATCH TOUCH UP AT 12 OZ EACH. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024120937
item.description:
Report X-2024120937

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: MASON
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF Freight
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF Checker Driver states that he was unloading trailer 573131 in dock door 5 when he saw a giant super sack of UN2211, POLYMERIC BEADS EXPANDABLE, 9, PG III had a spool puncturing the sack on side and when he tried to carefully remove the freight, the sack busted and spilled an estimated 350LB onto the trailer floor. ABF driver states that the spool was loaded way too close at the previous facility which rubbed against it during transit and ultimately busting the sack. ABF driver states that amazingly, all 350LB of the powder has been contained on the trailer. Safety advised driver to take pi ctures and immediately close the trailer afterwards to avoid any additional spillage to occur. Safety contacted CURA and made sure that they look everywhere around the trailer to make sure none of it spilled out on to the dock or yard. ABF advised driver to send photos to Safety.

item.title: Report E-2024120309
item.description:
Report E-2024120309

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-20
  • City: WHITMORE LAKE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1820 ET, with XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XAH. It was reported that approximately 1/2 gallon of 2K Acrylic Urethane Primer was released from a 1-gallon metal pail due to a forklift puncture by XAH. The release impacted the concrete at dock door 22. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site. 5-gallon poly drum contains two 1-gallon metal pails and oil dri.
